CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( Street_Name__c ), '', (Street_Name__c + ' ' + Number__c)) + IF(ISBLANK( Floor__c ), '', (', ' + Floor__c)) + IF(ISBLANK( Door__c ), '', IF((FIND('.', Floor__c)) > 0, (' ' + Door__c), ('. ' + Door__c))) + IF(ISBLANK( ZIP_Code__c), '', (', ' + ZIP_Code__c)) + IF(ISBLANK( City__c ), '', (' ' + City__c))
CustomField.label: Location
